Featuring voice acting by Lydia Arden!                    [https://www.backstage.com/u/lydia-arden/]

You fall asleep on your commute home and wake up...somewhere different. It looks and sounds just like the underground you are used to, but something is wrong. The corridors stretch infinitely and every exit seems to lead back to where you started. Even worse, something seems to be stalking you from the shadows.

  • Explore procedurally generated stations.
  • Ride a VR simulation of the London Underground.
  • Find a way out of this purgatory (if that's even possible...)
  • Avoid the shadows at all costs.
  • Ǧ̸̢̡̤̣̪̠̥̫̙̫̬͊͐I̶̘̙̦͚̮̘̰̲̩͂͒̋͝͝V̷͕̩̼̠̖͖̆͐̂͆̒̓̓̒̀̕Ę̵̧̨̛̲̼̥̖̹̳͖̻̤̤̬̅̈͗̇̅̎͋̄͌̉͐͗͒̾̚͝ͅ ̴̛̺̳̰̩̙̰̉̌̄̓̌̑̓̚̕̚ͅ  Ụ̷̻̄P̵̧̧̡͚̭̹͙̲̗̘̰̤͉̭̊͐́̏̆̈̀̎̅̅̑̚͠͝

Installation/Play Instructions: 

  1. Set up an Oculus Device in the Oculus app.
  2. Run the .exe with the device plugged into your computer.
Controls: Left Hand: Trigger: Teleport & UI Interaction X & Y (Face Buttons): Pause Menu Joystick: Snap Turning (45 Degrees) Right Hand: Joystick: Smooth Turning
